text: @HillaryClinton there have actually been over 76,000 Americans die from Covid19, when President @realDonaldTrump says who could have known what was going 2 happen, South Korea DID, they had 4 new cases yesterday & 1 death while US had over 2500 deaths & 28,000 new infections #UNFIT #VoteBlue2020
